statements: DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE speed > 100 AND vehicle_type='Car';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE location='Highway' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT id FROM traffic_data WHERE speed < 50);
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND speed > 50;
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE date < '2022-01-01' OR location LIKE '%Highway%';
DELETE FROM traffic_data WHERE speed BETWEEN 40 AND 60;
DELETE FROM traffic_lights WHERE intersection = 'Main Street' AND color = 'red';
DELETE FROM TrafficSensors WHERE traffic_volume < 100 AND status = 'malfunction';
DELETE FROM TrafficIncidents WHERE location = 'Highway 101' AND severity > 3;
DELETE FROM traffic_signals WHERE status = 'malfunction' AND location LIKE '%Intersection%';
DELETE FROM traffic_reports WHERE type = 'Accident' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
